pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ssm-parameter-generatorThis script generates SSM parameters in an AWS account based on the contents of a CSV file.The CSV file should have the following headers: - Name (string)- Type ("String" | "StringList" | "SecureString")- Value (string)- Description (string)## UsageTo run the script:- generate-ssm-parameters CSV-FILE-NAME --profile AWS-PROFILE --region AWS-REGIONThe script supports the following options:- profile: specifies the aws profile to use while running the script. Defaults to "default". If no default profile is found, it will try to use the AWS environment variables.- region: specifies the aws region to use while running the script. Defaults to "us-east-1". # generate-ssm-parameters
